Headline: #8 Halsted Temporary Reroute at Halsted/59th
ShortDescription: 8 Halsted buses temp. rerouted in both directions via Halsted, 55th, Racine, 63rd, & Halsted, due to fire department activity near Halsted/59th

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#8 Halsted buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Halsted, 55th, Racine, 63rd, and resume normal route on Halsted, due to fire department activity near Halsted/59th.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #59 59th/61st Temporary Reroute near Halsted/59th
ShortDescription: 59 59th/61st buses temp. rerouted EB: 59th, Racine, 55th, Wells; WB: 59th, Wentworth, Racine, 59th; due to fire department activity near Halsted/59th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#59 59th/61st buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Halsted/59th due to fire department activity near Halsted/59th.

Eastbound buses will operate via 59th, Racine, 55th and Wells.

Westbound buses will operate via 59th, Wentworth, Racine, then resume their normal route on 59th.

Allow extra travel time.
